content: DWS 225 Sanding discs Sanding discs for DWS 225 long-neck drywall sanders ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- ### FEATURES:Features Through-pad dust collection – allows for near-edge sanding and longer-lasting, clog-resistant pads Advanced abrasives – helps you to efficiently achieve a smooth drywall finish in less time Mesh net design – captures dust through the disc, reducing cleaning and extending the life of the abrasive Applications Sanding discs for finishing drywall (various grit sizes available) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material: Drywall, Gypsum, Wood Technical Data | Base material | Drywall, Gypsum, Wood ### ITEMS- 2305500 - Sanding disc DWS 225 P80 grit - Package Size 25 pc - 2305502 - Sanding disc DWS 225 P120 grit - Package Size 25 pc - 2305503 - Sanding disc DWS 225 P150 grit - Package Size 25 pc - 2305504 - Sanding disc DWS 225 P180 grit - Package Size 25 pc - 2305506 - Sanding disc DWS 225 P240 grit - Package Size 25 pc
